name: school-data-extraction
description: Automated extraction and organization of school marketing materials from Google Drive

scripts.full-extraction: npm run extract-drive && npm run organize-schools
scripts.test-connection: ts-node -e "import GoogleDriveExtractor from './extractors/google-drive-extractor'; const e = new GoogleDriveExtractor('test'); e.testConnection();"
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-downloads && npm run clean-output
scripts.generate-report: ts-node -e "import SchoolDataOrganizer from './scripts/organize-school-data'; const o = new SchoolDataOrganizer(); o.organize();"

author: Timeback Development Team
